graph.topic: Why should human beings travel to outer space?

nodes.text: a lot of people still consider space exploration as an act of wasting money
astronauts only brought useless rocks back to planet earth despite the large sum of money spent on their equipment
many facts about solar system can be discovered
a picture of planet earth proved that the earth is round, not flat
it is the earth which goes around the sun, not vice versa
If it was not for the space exploration, we would never know these facts
people can know more about the planet earth itself
By observing planet earth from outer space, people can find out ample things for example about the atmosphere of the planet earth
With this knowledge, people can work on something to prevent earth hazards such as global warming
a great deal of sophisticated technology can be invented
astronauts need to travel to outer space which does not have any oxygen to breathe in
scientists are compelled to do research on the oxygen tanks
Oxygen tanks, for instance, are proved useful not only in outer space but also underwater
spaceships, communication satellites and space pens also contribute a lot to the society
human beings should travel to outer space
In spite of costing a fortune, space exploration has given aforementioned benefits
